name: iOS 16.7.2 and iPadOS 16.7.2
available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to cause a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: The issue was resolved by sanitizing logging

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing an image may result in disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to heap corruption
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An attacker that has already achieved kernel code execution may be able to bypass kernel memory mitigations
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted input may lead to arbitrary code execution in user-installed apps
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A malicious app may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved handling of symlinks.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Hide My Email may be deactivated unexpectedly
advisories.description: An inconsistent user interface issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A device may be passively tracked by its Wi-Fi MAC address
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

cves.credit: Talal Haj Bakry and Tommy Mysk of Mysk Inc. @mysk_co

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Mingxuan Yang (@PPPF00L), happybabywu and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

cves.credit: Mingxuan Yang (@PPPF00L), and happybabywu and Guang Gong of 360 Vulnerability Research Institute

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may reveal browsing history
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An attacker with physical access may be able to use Siri to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by restricting options offered on a locked device.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

cves.credit: Cristian Dinca of "Tudor Vianu" National High School of Computer Science, Romania

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: A user's password may be read aloud by VoiceOver
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Pedro Ribeiro (@pedrib1337) and Vitor Pedreira (@0xvhp_) of Agile Information Security

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to address bar spoofing
advisories.description: An inconsistent user interface issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 3rd generation and later, iPad 5th generation and later, and iPad mini 5th generation and later
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.
